welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ealing, a charming borough in the heart of London known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport is used for VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy 45 minutes of free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for some low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is the largest terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport primarily serves international flights, with a few domestic flights as well.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but is limited to 90 minutes of free usage. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all public areas of the airport.
